website_summaries.verdict: Although this hefty Pumbaa looks like he just strolled straight out of the animated Lion King film, this cuddly and soft plush smells much better than the original warthog.
pros: Pair of grubs are attached to his mouth via string
Bugs can be placed under tongue
cons: An expensive, but nicely made plush toy

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 5 stars because it is Cute as all getout but if it's 14" it must be from the tip of his nose to the tip of his tale.He is not 14" Tall so I was hoping he would be bigger.Not worth returning based on that.UPDATE:I Noticed they offer a 12 1/2 inch also and I think that's what they sent me instead of the 14 inch.Be careful what you order there is a Big price difference.
customer_reviews.author: Charlane Valade

customer_reviews.title: Stitching Came Undone
customer_reviews.text: I had the product for a month and the stitching came undone.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to give to our grandson as part of a collection. We love it. Our grandson hasn’t seen it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Popular among toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this! And I like how the insects in Pumba's mouth are attached to a string so they can't be lost
customer_reviews.author: Cristie S. Shull

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this for any little Lion King fans out there
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. My kids wanted to cut the strings which attached the bugs to the warthogs mouth. It works that way too. You can play with the bugs separately or put them into the mouth and they stay there. Would definitely recommend this for any little Lion King fans out there. My three-year-old twin boys absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. A bit larger then I was expecting, very nice quality with Disney seal stitched onto his side. The bugs can be hidden in his mouth or pulled out. They are attached on a string, so " no worries " about losing them or them getting misplaced. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy P.

customer_reviews.title: Puma
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, my step son dos too. great item.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: Disney plush great gift
customer_reviews.text: Also ordered 2 other Disney plush with this one. So soft & adorable. Hard to let it go as a gift but I did.
customer_reviews.author: Skh

customer_reviews.title: Lion king fans
customer_reviews.text: Anyone that loves lion king will love it I bought this for my niece it’s good descent size and the quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: PUMBA conquers potty training
customer_reviews.text: Pumba was one of the incentive prizes that helped my granddaughter master potty training in record time! This Pumba was better detailed and of better material than all the rest I investigated before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ookpik

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it, and takes it to bed every night. Quality if first rate!
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and not a cheap stuffed toy either. My 3 year old loves this Pumba!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: very happy..
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my granddaughter. Was in Disney and could not find it. I ordered it from Amazon and made her very, very happy...
customer_reviews.author: John C. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time as described. Couldn't be happier with my purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rutland

customer_reviews.title: RARE
customer_reviews.text: We have looked for this at all the Disney Stores and I guess they are out... so glad we were able to find it here.
customer_reviews.author: Dagny E. Tabeling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect, and it arrived in a speedy manner.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: My son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is autistic and can speak of nothing but Pumbaa, absolutely loves this doll and sleeps with it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Fran S

customer_reviews.title: Great plush toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was a home run. The worms that are hanging out of his mouth are funny
customer_reviews.author: Loucas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This was a gift for my son who was Pumba in his middle school play. He loved this stuffed animal. It was had a quality look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Schlickstr

customer_reviews.title: Pumbaaaa!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend on her 19th birthday. I think she liked it...at least I'm pretty sure she did because she sent me a snapchat of it the next day. But if her dog chews this one up imma have to throw a fit
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for that ginormous Homecoming corsage. Paired with Timon on the garter this couple was a hit at school.
customer_reviews.author: K teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great Plush
customer_reviews.text: It is so soft and the bugs come out of the mouth which is great. It really looks like Pumba too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: great quality, very fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw him and literally said "I have to have him!" she is 8 and my 1 year old son loves this Pumbaa too. The bugs come out and you can put them back in his mouth. He is big and silly and we love him. This toy is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jerie L. Putnam

product_meta.title: Disney Store The Lion King 14" Pumbaa Plush Stuffed Animal Toy
product_meta.description: Disney Store The Lion King 14 Pumbaa Plush Stuffed Animal Toy
feature_bullets: Authentic Disney Store design and quality
Measures approximately 14" tall in sitting position
Includes dangling grub and ladybug for feeding
Part of the Disney Plush Collection based on characters from Disney's The Lion King: Diamond Edition Release

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
